Итак игра "Half-Life 2: Episode One", продолжение фантастического боевика "Half-Life 2". Закончилась игра "Half-Life 2", на стоп кадре, мощного взрыва, а эпизод первый, продолжает её историю. Отмечу, что продолжение игры, по сценарию, короткая, но слишком усложнённая и интересная, затягивающая, всё больше думать, как выйти из той или иной ситуации. Играем за Фримана и в компании Алекс, которая до конца эпизода будет его сопровождать, цель эвакуация людей из Сити-17 и нейтрализация ядра в цитадели, который нарастил критическую массу для взрыва. Волком одиночкам, это может и не понравиться, гулять с ботом, но Алекс будет здорово помогать, ну и строить "глазки" Фриману. 
Все, кто играл прошлую игру, подметили, под конец прохождения "гравипушку версию 2.0", хочу обрадовать, потому что в начале данной игры, проходя, через конфискатор оружия, она опять появиться. Правда только, в той части игры, где проходим сценарий в цитадели, за то любителям пошвырять "комбайнов", это принесет большое удовольствие. 
Новые враги в игре - сталкер и "зомбайны", как их нарекла Алекс, очень опасны и бьют больно по здоровью Фримана, поэтому для вас будет время, обдумать стратегии и планы, как с ними бороться.
Вообще в этой игре (я, её разделил на две части, цитадель и город), советую часто сохраняться, особенно в начале игры, потому что разрушающаяся цитадель, таит множество, смертельны ловушек.
Вот и всё, что я хотел написать, рекомендую, конечно, эту игру несмотря на дату выпуска, 1 июня 2006 года, всё равно найдутся, те кто в её не играл. Но, в первую очередь, советую играть, как задумано и по порядку выхода серий "Half-Life".

Previously on Half Life 2
More or less standard Half-Life 2 gameplay meant to fill the gap between Half-Life 2 and Episode 2. The development of the story is welcome, but the game is pretty average in a honesty.

The game is basically more HL2, but shorter. The campaign can definitely be done in 3 hours. Tops. After that its achievement hunting and whatnot. Dont think anyone would go here unless they already played previous Half Life games.

A lot of people seem so obsessed with this IP, but it has so many loopholes. In my HL2 review I mentioned the setting feels like its in Soviet Russia. I thought it was just the feeling until I have noticed shop letters being cyrillic and a hospital being written in Russian. So the game is definitely happening in that region, which raises the question, why is everyone speaking English, why are the main heroes there and why did they send off so many black people in this area? Asian-type people do live in that region, so they are more likely to be found, but this is weird.

The plot of the game doesnt really bring much either, as in, it contributes almost zero to the overall understanding of whats happening. What I can praise is Alyx as a companion, she has good animations and shows a lot of character. The gameplay is alright, but for the length and the price, this feels underwhelming. Honestly, unless you got this in a bundle, played the previous ones and want to know what happens next, I wouldnt recommend getting it or going through it.

It was an overall enjoyable experience, so i will rate it positive, but I would have given the product a neutral score if there was an option.

Başlangıç ve sonu olan ortası kısmen boş kalmış hikâyeye, devamını sağlayan paketleri yazarken değinmek istedim. Dünya ilk oyunda açılan bir kapıdan giren varlıkların istilasıyla yüz yüze kalmıştı, olayların gelişimini oynarken görüyorduk. İkinci oyun ise kontrol kısmen sağlanmakla birlikte diktatörlük benzeri bir Combine istilası söz konusu.  Eski Black Mesa çalışanlarının da aralarında bulunduğu direnişçilere yardım etmek için bir trende ortaya çıkıyorduk. Trendeki adamın birisi biraz önce burada mıydın? Gibisinden bir soruyla gizemli gelişimizi irdeliyor fakat şaşırmıyordu niyeyse. Hikâyedeki en göze çarpan taraf Alyx isimli kızın partnerliğinde hareket etmemizdi. Kendisinden sonra gelen oyunlara yol gösterdiği bir başka tarafı da bu. Partner yardımlarıyla kapı açmak, bölümde ilerlemek, hikâyeyi dinlemek sonraki diğer oyunlarda da yer yer kullanıldı. Fazla uzatmadan dünyayı saran geçişin kaynağına doğru gittiğimiz bir yol var tabii öncesinde Alyx’in Profesör babasının kaçırılması durumu söz konusu. Genelde onun izinden gidiyoruz, akış bu yönde. Sonunda arzuladığımız patlatma sonumuz oluyorken Episode 1 ile bitti denilenin ötesine geçiyoruz ve yeniden hayata dönüyoruz bize yardımcı olan yaratıklar tarafından. Amacımız yine Alyx’in babasına doğru ilerlemek.

Bölümler EP1 de ana oyuna göre farklılık göstermiyor açıkçası, tersten ilerliyor denebilir. Kel Prof. un çağrısıyla önce merkezdeki çekirdeğin güç kalkanını kaldırmamız isteniyor, devamında ilerliyoruz trene atlayıp patlama yaşanana kadar. Aynı oyunun tersi gibi ilerlememize (ki yine de otopark ve yeni zombi bölümleri mevcut)rağmen Valve ekibi yapmayı iyi başardıkları bir şeyi devam ettirerek oyuna yeni dinamikler eklemeyi sürdürmüşler. Mekânlar tanıdık lakin oynanışta farklılıklar mevcut, ayrıca grafikler kısmen geliştirilmiş. İlk oyundan akılda kalan çark mekaniğini kullanıyoruz kimi geçilmeyen yerlerde, top mayınlarını hackleme dinamiği eklenmiş, araçları kum böceklerinin geldiği yerlere iterek çözülen bulmacalar, Alyx’in yardımları ve uzaktan sniper atışıyla önümüzü temizlediği yerler mevcut. Yeniden direnişçilerle karşılaşmamız, trene sivilleri taşımamız ve sonrasında kendimizin binmesi ve şehirden uzaklaştığımız sırada yaşanan patlamayla oyunun ilk ek paketi sona eriyor.
Half-Life ''nin devamı niteliğinde, Binadan kaçış biraz sıkıcı, Episode Two daha eğlenceli geldi bana

[h1]"Un Éxodo contrareloj"[/h1]

Half-Life 2: Episodio 1, fue el primero de tres episodios lanzados para continuar con la trama presentada en Half-Life 2. Lanzado por Valve en 2006 (2 años después del primer juego), en donde comenzamos justo en donde acabo el juego anterior ([spoiler]Con la explosión del reactor de la Ciudadela[/spoiler]) en donde los Vortigaunts nos rescatan del lugar, y apartan a "G-Man" de influenciarnos.

Ya a salvo, el Dr. Kleiner nos comenta que la Ciudadela está por explotar, en donde nuestra misión es evacuar junto con el remanente de la resistencia la Ciudad 17, y llegar a una base segura antes que los Combine lancen un contraataque brutal. Más aún cuando Alyx Vance porta una información que puede inclinar la balanza a favor de la guerra contra ellos.

Ocupa todo lo presentado en el juego anterior, sin embargo su duración es mucho más corta. Y no existe nada novedoso. 

Pese a ello, lo recomiendo muchisimo.

HALF-LIFE 2: EPISODE 1<

The sequal to half-life 2 came into the scene in 2006. Episode 1, formerly known as Half-life: Aftermath, was the beginning of the new episodic style valve was realeasing new installments. This would give fans what they wanted without having them wait years and years for another game but with some understandable sacrifices. The game was a hit for fans of the previous installments and brought some new tech advancements into the game such as better lighting. The plot takes place right after the end of Half-life 2 and doesn't waste any time getting back into the meat of it.

PROS:
-The story is very well paced and put together very nicely as all the others. You play as Gordon Freeman again during the aftermath of the citadels destruction. Not spoiling the rest in case you haven't picked up a copy in the many years its existed.
-The environment is very immersive as it is a long seamless road to the end of the game with, as the definition of seamless implies, zero cutscenes or immersion breaking interruptions.
-The gunplay involves the same chaotic weapons from half-life 2. The arsenal available is pleasently loud, very powerful feeling, and quite fun to use when eliminating the enemy as per tradition.
-Dialogue breaks are few, far between, and about a minute each if you even count them as such.
-Same engine as hal-life 2 to no surprise but with very few legitimate puzzles to get your thinker going.
-As with half-life 2, the ending is satasfying and closes things out with a nice bow ribbon.

CONS: (Not even half-life is safe from sin, sorry) Please note that i am extremely aware that this game is sorta old.
-Controls feel less floaty than half-life 1 but there's still some slip n sliding.
-The combine is a painfully easy enemy throughout the entire game and even when their ranks change.
-Various visual bugs and other graphical anomalies give the game a kind of rushed feeling.
-The games puzzles and other logic based conundrums are bonehead easy and will just seem like annoyances on successive playthroughs.
-Not much of a con but i found it quite odd that gordon gets his crowbar more towards the end dispite being his iconic weapon of choice.

This game is about as much of a must have as half-life 2. I picked the entire series up in a frantic buy in a summer sale and it was worth it. To me the episodes wern't very replayable, they arn't very exciting to play again and not very memorable. The games main critisim is it's length which is somthing that i fully agree with. I wasn't aware of half-life 2 at the time so i wasn't one of the masses waiting anxiously for this to drop but i think the length was perfect. I feel as if it went any longer it would have outstayed its welcome and become a bore. I certainly would'nt skip the game for fans just coming in but if anything it's textures for gmod if you don't have much interest in it.

Vuelta al mundo de Half-Life que continúa la historia donde la dejó Half-Life 2. La mitad del juego son secciones más orientadas a la acción con más soldados, caos y luz mientras que la otra mitad es más creepy con zombies, zonas claustrofóbicas y oscuridad. Aceptar el reto de pasarse el juego sin disparar que proponen los logros me ha hecho disfrutar más la experiencia, en lo personal recomendaría jugarlo así al menos una vez.

Half-Life 2:Episode One to gra stworzona przez valve i wydana przez Sierra w 2006 roku.
Ponownie wcielamy sie w Gordona Freemana,Który wraz ze swoja Partnerka Alyx próbuja uciec z miasta City 17 ,które po ostatnich wydarzeniach jest w rozsypce.
Fabuła jest dobra jednakże nie tak dobra jak w Half-Life 2 brakuje tu tego klimatu z Pierwzoru,jednakże i tak jest dobrze.
Episode One cierpi na to samo co pierwowzór czyli muzyka nie dopasowana do miejsca akcji,oraz ze swiatła oraz bieganie jest liczone do tego samego,chodzi o to,że jak uzywamy latarke jest uzywany ten sam pasek co np.W trakcie biegania,przeszkadza to momentami ale tak to nie ma żadnych poważnych minusów.
Grafika dużej rewolucji nie przeszła.
Gre mimo wszystko polecam nie jest tak świetna jak Pierwowzór,ale jeśli ktoś sie interysuje sie  losami Gordona Freemana to swietne sobie uzypełni fabułą.
Ocena Ogólna:7/10

I absolutely love the half life series and all the games, I recommend every single one of the games but am extremely disappointed in valve. The complete lack of ANY communication for TEN YEARS is completly disgusting, It is disrepectful to the fans who supported valve for years. Its sad that valve doesnt even have the courtesy to tell their fans that half life is dead. It is clear that we will never get a satisfying ending to an amazing story. I personally am not interested in anything valve has released since Episode 2, and if the single player story driven masterpieces of recent years are anything to go by, its that valve only cares about its games as service titles, and not their narative driven campaigns. I am deeply upset that we will never get to explore the atmospheric and exciting universe of half life again. Valve prides themselves on their independance and flat workplace structure, but its clear there is a lack of focus. Valve, like too many companies in the video games industry, seem to be too blinded on following the money, they have left behind those that got them there in the first place...
